add the character pallet utility to your panel
it's a key that allows you to use the extended chars (hence the "compose" name)
for instance, under System> Preferences> Keyboard> Layout Options> Compose key position, I set the right Ctrl on my UK keyboard to be compose
then to make the , I hold Compose and type ', then I type e
